db:abstract.db:para: The AccelBubble example demonstrates the Accelerometer QML type.

db:article.db:programlisting: <?xml version="1.0"?> <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.2" baseProfile="tiny"> <defs> <radialGradient id="grad1" cx="0.5" cy="0.7" r="0.7" fx="0.5" fy="0.4"> <stop offset="0" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255)" /> <stop offset="1.5" style="stop-color:rgb(0,102,153)" /> </radialGradient> </defs> <circle cx="100" cy="80" r="42" fill="url(#grad1)"/> </svg>
